```{r, warning= FALSE, echo = FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(janitor)

penguins <- read_csv("data/penguins_lter.csv")

penguins <- penguins %>% 
  clean_names("snake")
```

## Page 1

### Row2

```{r, warning= FALSE}
penguins$date <- as.Date(penguins$date_egg, format = "%m/%d/%y")

p1 <- ggplot(penguins, aes(x = date, y = body_mass_g, fill = island))+
  geom_point() + 
  labs(
    x = "date",
    y = "Penguin Weight(g)")
  
ggplotly(p1)
```

### Row3

```{r, warning=FALSE}
penguins_small <- penguins %>% 
  select(study_name, species,region, island, date_egg, culmen_depth_mm, culmen_length_mm, flipper_length_mm, body_mass_g, sex)

knitr::kable(penguins_small)
```
